# Changelog

## [1.0.0] - 2024-12-12

### Added
- Initial release of Infiltrator WiFi Red Team Auditing Suite
- Reconnaissance & Intelligence Gathering (5 tools)
  - Passive Scanner & Analyzer
  - Client Probe Monitor
  - Target Tracker
  - Geo-Spatial Mapper
  - Protocol Fingerprinter
- Exploitation & Attack Automation (6 tools)
  - Deauth Attack Suite
  - Handshake/PMKID Capture
  - Multi-Adapter Evil Twin
  - WPS Brute-Forcer
  - WPA3-SAE Downgrade
  - 802.1X EAP Phishing
- Post-Attack Operations (4 tools)
  - Offline Cracking Integration
  - Automated Chain Execution
  - Stealth & OPSEC Tools
  - Cloud Cracking API
- Multi-adapter support
- Menu-driven CLI interface
- PyPI package support
- Debian (.deb) package support
- Complete documentation
